title.narrative: Colombia Rural Education Project (APL Phase II)

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to increase rural population#s access to quality education from pre-school to upper secondary level, promote higher retention of children and youths in the school system and improve education programs relevant to rural communities and their school populations.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Section I Part B | Description :Agreement between the MEN and the Supporting Trust Agency to facilitate theimplementation of Part 2 of the Project | Due Date :31-Dec-2008
Finance Agreement :Section I Part C | Description :Tripartite Rural Education Sub-project agreement with each Territorial Entity,MEN and the Trust Agent | Due Date :28-Jan-2009
